name: Platform for Better Oral Health in Europe
goal:
The mission of the Platform is to improve oral health and enhance cost-effective prevention of oral diseases in Europe.
Our goal is to create a common European approach towards improved oral health education, promotion, and access to care in Europe.
Our approach is to:
- Encourage oral health and the prevention of oral diseases as a fundamental to good general health;
- Enhance the EU’s oral health policy, including incorporating oral health in to relevant policies;
- Secure EU action on oral health;
- Address oral health inequalities and challenges, especially among vulnerable populations like children and adolescents, the elderly, and those with special needs.
interests: Budget, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Public health policy, in particular oral health policy and including education, prevention and training;
- Nutrition and food policy
- Chronic diseases prevention
- Tobacco, alcohol policy
